00013 #include <mcMd/perturb/Perturbation.h>  
00014 #include <mcMd/util/FileMaster.h>  
00015 
00016 #include <cstdio> 
00017 
00018 namespace McMd
00019 {
00020 
00021    using namespace Util;
00022 
00023    /* 
00024    * Constructor.
00025    */
00026    PerturbDerivative::PerturbDerivative(System& system)
00027     : SystemDiagnostic<System>(system),
00028       isInitialized_(false)
00029    {}
00030 
00031    /*
00032    * Read parameters and initialize.
00033    */
00034    void PerturbDerivative::readParam(std::istream& in)
00035    {
00036 
00037       readInterval(in);
00038       readOutputFileName(in);
00039       read<int>(in,"nSamplePerBlock", nSamplePerBlock_);
00040 
00041       accumulator_.setNSamplePerBlock(nSamplePerBlock_);
00042 
00043       read<int>(in,"parameterIndex", parameterIndex_);
00044 
00045       // If nSamplePerBlock != 0, open an output file for block averages.
00046       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00047          fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".dat"), outputFile_);
00048       }
00049 
00050       isInitialized_ = true;
00051    }
00052 
00053    /*
00054    * Clear accumulator.
00055    */
00056    void PerturbDerivative::setup()
00057    {
00058       if (!isInitialized_) {
00059          UTIL_THROW("Object is not initialized");
00060       }
00061       accumulator_.clear();
00062    }
00063 
00064 
00065    /* 
00066    * Evaluate perturbation derivative, and add to accumulator.
00067    */
00068    void PerturbDerivative::sample(long iStep) 
00069    {
00070       if (isAtInterval(iStep))  {
00071          accumulator_.sample(system().perturbation().derivative(parameterIndex_), outputFile_);
00072       }
00073    }
00074 
00075    /*
00076    * Output results to file after simulation is completed.
00077    */
00078    void PerturbDerivative::output() 
00079    { 
00080       // If outputFile_ was used to write block averages, close it.
00081       if (accumulator_.nSamplePerBlock()) {
00082          outputFile_.close();
00083       }
00084 
00085       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".prm"), outputFile_);
00086       writeParam(outputFile_); 
00087       outputFile_.close();
00088 
00089       fileMaster().openOutputFile(outputFileName(".ave"), outputFile_);
00090       accumulator_.output(outputFile_); 
00091       outputFile_.close();
00092 
00093    }
00094    
00095 }
00096 #endif    // ifndef PERTURB_DERIVATIVE_CPP
00097 #endif    // ifdef  MCMD_PERTURB
